disorder.name: Aichmophobia
disorder.desc: You cannot activate or depart with axes, swords, spears, daggers, scythes, or katars in your gear grid.

disorder.name: Anxiety
disorder.desc: At the start of each showdown, gain the priority target token unless you have stinky gear in your gear grid.

disorder.name: Apathetic
disorder.desc: You cannot use or gain survival. You cannot gain courage. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ understanding.

disorder.name: Binge Eating
disorder.desc: You cannot depart unless you have consumable gear in your gear grid. You must consume if a choice to consume arises.

disorder.name: Coprolalia
disorder.desc: All your gear is noisy. You are always a threat unless you are knocked down, even if an effect says otherwise.

disorder.name: Fear of the Dark
disorder.desc:
You retire.
If you gain this disorder during a hunt or showdown, you put on a brave face until you return to the settlement, vowing never to leave the Lantern Hoard again.

disorder.name: Hemophobia
disorder.desc: During the showdown, whenever a survivor (including you) gains a bleeding token, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Hoarder
disorder.desc: Whenever you are a returning survivor, archive 1 resource gained from the last showdown and gain +1 courage.

disorder.name: Honorable
disorder.desc: You cannot attack a monster from its blind spot or if it is knocked down.

disorder.name: Hyperactive
disorder.desc: During the showdown, you must move at least 1 space every round.

disorder.name: Immortal
disorder.desc:
While you are insane, convert all damage dealt to your hit locations to brain damage.
You are so busy reveling in your own glory that you cannot spend survival while insane.

disorder.name: Indecision
disorder.desc: If you are the event revealer of hunt events that call on you to make a roll, roll twice and use the lower result.

disorder.name: Monster Panic
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer brain damage from an Intimidate action, suffer 1 additional brain damage.

disorder.name: Post-Traumatic Stress
disorder.desc: Next settlement phase, you do not contribute or participate in any endeavors. Skip the next hunt to recover.

disorder.name: Prey
disorder.desc: You may not spend survival unless you are insane.

disorder.name: Quixotic
disorder.desc: If you are insane when you depart, gain +1 survival and +1 Strength token.

disorder.name: Rageholic
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer a severe injury, also suffer the frenzy brain trauma.

disorder.name: Secretive
disorder.desc: When you are a returning survivor, you quickly become preoccuiped with your own affairs. You must skip the next hunt to deal with them.

disorder.name: Seizures
disorder.desc: During the showdown, whenever you suffer damage to your head location, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Squeamish
disorder.desc: You cannot depart with any stinky gear in your gear grid. If a status or effect would cause you to become stinky, lose all your survival.

disorder.name: Traumatized
disorder.desc: Whenever you end your act adjacent to a monster, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Vestiphobia
disorder.desc: You cannot wear armor at the body location. If you are wearing armor at the body location when you gain this disorder, archive it as you tear it off your person!

disorder.name: Weak Spot
disorder.desc: When you gain this disorder, roll a random hit location and record it. You cannot depart unless you have armor at this hit location.

disorder.flavor_text: No one knows where your mind goes when you're gone, not even you.
disorder.name: Absent Seizures
disorder.desc: The first time you would suffer a brain trauma each showdown, you are instead knocked down and forget a fighting art (erase it).

disorder.flavor_text: Even large, looming shadows make you jumpy.
disorder.name: Megalophobia
disorder.desc: You may not depart for hunts or showdowns with monsters that occupy more than 4 spaces on the showdown board.

disorder.flavor_text: You are deeply afraid of being the monster controller.
disorder.name: Controlophobia
disorder.desc: While you are the monster controller, double any damage you suffer.

disorder.flavor_text: When a fellow hunter perishes you lose control.
disorder.name: Revenge
disorder.desc: When a survivors dies during the showdown, suffer the Frenzy brain trauma.

disorder.flavor_text: You are irrationally scared by tiny spiders and the things they produce.
disorder.name: Tiny Arachnophobia
disorder.desc: You cannot carry any gear with the amber keyword. You cannot gain any resources with the silk keyword.

disorder.flavor_text: You love numbers. Your life must exist in perfect arithmetical harmony.
disorder.name: Arithmophilia
disorder.desc:
When you gain this disorder, roll 1d5. Your movement is that number.

Ignore all other movement modifiers.

disorder.flavor_text: You have a grand destiny that you must fulfill.
disorder.name: Destined
disorder.desc: If you do not depart, lose all survival and insanity.

disorder.flavor_text: You're not ready to love.
disorder.name: Performance Anxiety
disorder.desc:
You cannot be nominated for Intimacy.

Cure this disorder if you have 8+ courage.

disorder.flavor_text: Evil magic will be your undoing. You do not believe in abusing the other.
disorder.name: Superstitious
disorder.desc: You cannot activate or depart with other gear in your gear grid.

disorder.flavor_text: Predators of all shapes and sizes find your scent irresistible.
disorder.name: Delicious
disorder.desc: You are still considered a threat when you are knocked down (unless you use an effect that says otherwise).

disorder.flavor_text: You are delicate flower, wilting in the darkness.
disorder.name: Enfeebled
disorder.desc: It takes one less bleeding token to kill you.

disorder.flavor_text: Freedom awaits those pushed this far beyond the breaking point.
disorder.name: Stark Raving
disorder.desc: You are always insane, regardless of your insanity.

disorder.flavor_text: If you're not killing something, you're wasting your time.
disorder.name: Tunnel Vision
disorder.desc: When you spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font>, you may only activate weapons.

disorder.flavor_text: You don't have any emotions. You've hidden this from everyone by mimicking their social interactions.
disorder.name: Emotionless
disorder.desc: You cannot gain +1 strength tokens.

disorder.flavor_text: You love the feeling of being needed.
disorder.name: Overprotective
disorder.desc: When an adjacent survivor is knocked down, you are also knocked down as you rush to their aid.

disorder.flavor_text: When your emotions rise, you can only think of violence.
disorder.name: Sun-Drunk
disorder.desc: When you have any +1 strength tokens, you cannot dash, dodge or g Run Away.

disorder.flavor_text: An insatiable hunger has bloomed in you, delicate and sickeningly sweet.
disorder.name: Flower Addiction
disorder.desc:
You may only depart to hunt the Flower Knight.

After you depart, cure this disorder.

disorder.flavor_text: You cannot experience fear if you do not exist.
disorder.name: Ghostly Beauty
disorder.desc:
Double all insanity you gain.

Double all survival you spend.

disorder.flavor_text: There is nothing in the world more beautiful than yourself.
disorder.name: Narcissistic
disorder.desc: You may not wear armor at the head location. If you are wearing armor at the head location when you gain this disorder, archive it.

disorder.flavor_text: Your will to survive has become indefatigable
disorder.name: Hyper-Sensitivity
disorder.desc:
You may dodge one additional time per round.

Whenever you are hit by an attack, you must dodge at least once, if possible.

disorder.flavor_text: The roads in your mind cross and reveal a strange new path.
disorder.name: Spiral Ganglia
disorder.desc: At the start of the showdown, gain the Darkness Awareness survivor status card.

disorder.flavor_text: Moving quickly makes you vomit.
disorder.name: Motion Sickness
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer knockback, gain 1 bleeding token.

disorder.flavor_text: You love insects.
disorder.name: Vermin Obsession
disorder.desc: While there is a Bug Spot terrain tile on the showdown board, you are so overwhelmed that you are doomed.

disorder.flavor_text: The double-edged sword of fame is the only weapon you require.
disorder.name: Prima Donna
disorder.desc: Each survivor turn, you must take your act first (roll off each turn if multiple survivors have this disorder).

disorder.flavor_text: Yelling makes you feel light-headed.
disorder.name: Shallow Lungs
disorder.desc: When you encourage, you are knocked down.

disorder.flavor_text: You hate being the center of attention.
disorder.name: Stage Fright
disorder.desc: Whenever you become doomed or gain the priority target token, lose 1 survival.

disorder.flavor_text: Your mother always said you were born under a bad sign.
disorder.name: Unlucky
disorder.desc: You cannot critically wound.

fa.name: Ambidexterous
fa.desc: All melee weapons in your gear grid gain paired. Ambidexterous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed or heavy gear in your gear grid.

fa.name: Berserker
fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend a to suffer bash and the frenzy brain trauma.

fa.name: Clutch Fighter
fa.desc: While you have 3 or more bleeding tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.

fa.name: Combo Master
fa.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

fa.name: Crazed
fa.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 insanity.

fa.name: Crossarm Block
fa.desc: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.

fa.name: Double Dash
fa.desc: During your act, once per round, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font> to gain <font class='kdm_font'>c</font>.

fa.name: Extra Sense
fa.desc: You may dodge 1 additional time per round.

fa.name: Last Man Standing
fa.desc: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.

fa.name: Leader
fa.desc:
Encourage a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until end of the round.
Once per hunt phase another survivor can use your understanding and courage to resolve.

fa.name: Mighty Strike
fa.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +2 Strength until the end of the attack.

fa.name: Monster Claw Style
fa.desc: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength and Savage.

fa.name: Orator of Death
fa.desc:
Once per showdown, you may spend a to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity.
When you die, you encourage all survivors.

fa.name: Rhythm Chaser
fa.desc:
On Arrival, gain +1 evasion token. When you are knocked down, if you don't have an instrument in your gear grid, remove all your +1 evasion tokens.
Cannot be used with heavy gear.

fa.name: Strategist
fa.desc: During the showdown setup, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.

fa.name: Thrill Seeker
fa.desc: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.

fa.name: Timeless Eye
fa.desc:
Your attack roll is a perfect hit on a result of a 9 or 10.
You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the blind severe head injury.

fa.name: Tough
fa.desc: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. (This does not include brain trauma. The result total cannot exceed 10.)

fa.name: Tumble
fa.desc: On collide roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully tumble out of harm's way. Instead, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.

fa.name: Unconscious Fighter
fa.desc: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.
When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>c</font> to place your survivor on any other space adjacent to the monster.
fa.name: Acrobatics

fa.desc:
Before making an attack, you may add your understanding to your accuracy attribute for that attack.

Limit, once per showdown.
fa.name: Champion's Rite

fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and Devastating 1.
fa.name: Fated Blow

fa.desc: Once per lantern year, you may ignore one of your severe injury roll results. If you do, gain a random disorder.
fa.name: Unbreakable

fa.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Steadfast survivor status card.

When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.
fa.name: Carapace of Will

fa.desc:
At the start of a showdown, gain the Momentum survivor status card.

When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attempting to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.
fa.name: Propulsion Drive

fa.desc:
During the Hunt and Settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table.

(This includes Hunt Events, Story Events, Endeavors, Settlement Events, etc.)
fa.name: Otherworldly Luck

fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font> to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.
fa.name: Lure Epilepsy

fa.desc: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.
fa.name: Mammoth Hunting

fa.desc: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.
fa.name: Burning Focus

fa.desc: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
fa.name: Heroic

fa.desc: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain a Skull basic resource.
fa.name: Ruthless

fa.desc: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.
fa.name: Unrelenting

fa.desc: When you become doomed or gain the priority target token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength token.
fa.name: Headliner

fa.desc:
When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may put that hit location back on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile.

Limit, once per round.
fa.name: Tenacious

fa.desc: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.
fa.name: Wardrobe Expert

fa.desc:
The first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.

Ignore the effects of the Fear of the Dark and Prey disorders.
fa.name: Abyssal Sadist

fa.desc:
Whenever a random hunt event result is:

11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99 or 100,

the event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.
fa.name: Seasoned Hunter

fa.desc:
The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster.

At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.
fa.name: Trailblazer

fa.desc:
When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.

Ignore the effects of the Aichmophobia and Apathetic disorders.
fa.name: Transcended Masochist

fa.desc: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.
fa.name: Blotted Out

fa.desc:
The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resources and gain +1 evasion token.

Lose this token if you are deaf or become deaf during the showdown.
fa.name: Phantom Friend

fa.desc:
Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token.

If you have the Tiny Arachnophobia disorder, you are too scared of spiders to imitate them and you cannot use this fighting art.
fa.name: Harvestman

fa.desc: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.
fa.name: Vengeance

fa.desc: When you are instructed to Skip the Next Hunt, ignore it. The 'Skip Next Hunt' box on your survivor record sheet cannot be filled in.
fa.name: Burning Ambition

fa.desc:
When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival from your words of encouragement.

You cannot use this if you have a broken jaw.
fa.name: Defender

fa.desc:
Your comrades make you strong enough to exceed the limits of death itself.

During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.
fa.name: Purpose

fa.desc: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +4 strength for that attack.
fa.name: Sneak Attack

fa.desc: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the priority target token.
fa.name: Trick Attack

sfa.name: Beast of Caratosis
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Beast of Caratosis at the start of your next act.
Beast of Caratosis: Place your survivor adjacent to the monster. For this attack, your attack speed is equal to your red affinities, you hit automatically, and you gain strength equal to double your red affinities. Then, gain +6 Hunt XP.

sfa.name: Bone Whisperer
sfa.desc:
When another survivor dies on the showdown board, place a token where they died. If you pass over it, remove the token and eat their skull. Heal your survivor and roll 1d10 + your Hunt XP:
1-3You feel amazing! Gain +1 permanent movement, speed and evasion.
4-8Gain +1 permanent strength.
9-18You gain a fighting art and +5 survival.
19+You run away into exile. At the end of the showdown, you are gone forever.

sfa.name: Lucernae's Lantern
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Lucernae's Lantern at the start of your next act.
Lucernae's Lantern: You reach into the dream and excise a screeching skull, darker than darkness. It hurtles at the monster.
Reveal hit locations equal to half your blue affinities (rounded down) one at a time. The mosnter suffers a critical wound at any locations with critical wound effects. (Ignore the effects of trap.) Then reshuffle the hit location deck. Gain +6 Hunt XP.

sfa.name: Grace of Dormenatus
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Grace of Dormenatus at the start of your next act.
Grace of Dormenatus: You reach into the dream and remove a twisting green crown. The crown explodes. A glittering rain of shards coats the survivors.
All survivors gain armor at all hit locations equal to your green affinities. They may remove up to the same number of tokens. Them, gain +6 Hunt XP. If you still exist, gain the priority target token.

sfa.name: King's Step
sfa.desc: Whenever you attack, you may discard any number of Battle Pressure hit locations drawn and draw an equal number of new hit locations. Whenever you attack, after drawing hit locations, but before rolling to wound, you may choose one hit location drawn and discard it to draw a new hit location. Traps will cancel these effects.

sfa.name: King of a Thousand Battles
sfa.desc: Gain +2 Accuracy, +2 Strength, +2 Evasion. You may dodge any number of times in a round. Only 1 survivor may have this Secret Fighting Art.

sfa.name: Legendary Lungs
sfa.desc: Once per attack, for each successful hit, make an additional attack roll.

sfa.name: Red Fist
sfa.desc: At the start of each showdown, each survivor gains +1 Strength token. Survivors may spend +1 Strength tokens in place of survival.

sfa.name: Scholar of Death
sfa.desc:
On Arrival, gain reroll tokens equal to the number of volumes recorded about your quarry. (e.g. if your settlement has White Lion Volumes 1, 2, and 3 when you fight a White Lion, gain 3 reroll tokens.)
Discard a reroll token to reroll one of your roll results during the showdown. This includes monster roll results when you are the monster controller.

sfa.name: Swordsman's Promise
sfa.desc: At the start of each showdown, gain survival up to your settlement's survival limit if you have a sword in your gear grid.

sfa.name: Synchronized Strike
sfa.desc:
With flawless coordination, you strike as one. When you're adjacent to a monster, attack with a melee weapon, and have an Attack Assist, your attack gains +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength. Limit, once per round.
Attack Assist: A survivor who also has Synchronized Strike and is in the right spot. They are standing adjacent to the monster, on its opposite side, and parallel to you.

sfa.name: Zero Presence
sfa.desc: Gain +1 Strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.

Once per showdown, you may spend a to shove an adjacent obstacle terrain. If you do, move the train directly away from you in a straight line until it encounters a board edge or another obstacle terrain. Any monsters the train passes over suffer a wound, and any survivors it collides with suffer knockback 7.

The display of strength is so exhausting it ages you. You are knocked down and gain +1 Hunt XP.
sfa.name: Beetle Strength

sfa.desc: If you would gain a negative attribute token, gain a positive attribute token of that type instead.
sfa.name: Altered Destiny

sfa.desc:
Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a monster's brain. They gain -2 accuracy until the end of the round.

Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a survivor's brain, killing them instantly. They die.
sfa.name: Frozen Star

sfa.desc:
You may wear up to 3 Satchel gear cards.

When you depart, if you are not wearing any armor, for each green affinity you have, gain +1 strength token and add 1 to all hit locations.

Spend a and a Flower or Fresh Acanthus resource to heal a permanent injury you or an adjacent survivor suffered this showdown.
sfa.name: Acanthus Doctor

sfa.desc:
Ignore Parry when attempting to wound hit locations. (Attempt to wound these locations normally.)

When a monster attacks you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore 1 hit. Limit, once per round.
sfa.name: Fencing

sfa.desc:
All swords in your gear grid gain deadly.

Gain +3 luck when attacking with a sword if you have the Ghostly Beauty and Narcissistic disorders.
sfa.name: True Blade

sfa.desc: If you are on an unoccupied space, you stand firm in the face of any force. You cannot be knocked down and may ignore knockback. (If you occupy the same space as a monster, impassable terrain tile, or another survivor, you are knocked down and suffer knockback.)
sfa.name: Immovable Object

sfa.desc:
When you depart, gain 1 shield to all hit locations for each gear card in your grid with the symbol keyword.

If you would roll on the severe injury table, roll on the Worm Trauma table on the other side of this card instead.

When you die or forget this, the settlement gains the Knowledge Worm innovation.
sfa.name: Necromancer

sfa.desc:
[1-3]: A spray of blood and silver. Dead.
[4-5]: The worm's coil tightens sharply. Gain 2 bleeding tokens and -1 evasion token.
[6-7]: A dizzying blow. Gain 1 bleeding token and 1d5 insanity.
[8]: An inhuman voice screams in your bones. Gain 1 bleeding token and 1d5 insanity.
[9]: The pain is infuriating! Gain 1 bleeding token and + 1 strength token.
[10]: Molten metal issues from your mouth. You are knocked down and gain 1 iron strange resource.
sfa.name: Worm Trauma table

sfa.desc:
When yu gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.

When you depart, you may rotate up to 3 gear cards in your gear grid. This changes the location of their affinities and arrows. Otherwise, the gear functions normally.
sfa.name: Ageless Apprentice

sfa.desc: At the start of the showdown, secretly write down on a scrap of paper which survivors will live and who will deal the killing blow. During the aftermath, if your predictions were correct, raise the settlement's Survival Limit by 1.
sfa.name: Courtly Screenwriter

sfa.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength for each permanent injury you have.

You may always depart, even when retired.
sfa.name: Eternal Will

sfa.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Path of Gloom survivor status card.

There is a deadly, otherworldly presence about you. Other survivors cannot voluntarily end their movement adjacent to you.
sfa.name: Clarity of Darkness

sfa.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy when attacking with Fist & Tooth.

When you wound a monster, it gains -1 toughness until the end of your attack.

You cannot use this if you are male.
sfa.name: Death Touch

sfa.desc:
0:nothing
1:You may spend a while adjacent to another survivor to add 2 shield to one of their hit locations.
2:While all armor in your gear grid is silk and all jewelry is amber, gain +2 evasion.
3:During the aftermath, roll 1d10 for each other survivor that died during the showdown. On a 7+, revive them.
sfa.name: Silk Surgeon

sfa.desc:
You cannot lose or remove this fighting art.

Gain +1 strength for each full red affinity you have. You cannot be nominated for Intimacy. You ignore Extreme Heat.

At the start of your act, lose 1 survival. At the end of your act, if your survival is 0 or you have any +1 strength tokens, your organs cook themselves and you die.
sfa.name: Hellfire

sfa.desc:
Your body mysteriously absorbs light. At the start of the showdown, gain survival up to the settlement's Survival Limit.

If you have any +1 strength tokens, you may spend them all to perform the Surge survival action (following all of its normal rules and restrictions).
sfa.name: Sun Eater

sfa.desc:
You no longer cast a shadow and you never hesitate. Ignore First Strike.

On a Perfect Hit, your first wound attempt of the attack automatically succeeds and inflicts a critical wound.

If you die during the showdown, place a Shade minion in the space you occupied.
sfa.name: Suppressed Shadow

sfa.desc:
Swords in your gear grid gain Block 1.

When you block a hit with a sword, your next attack that round with a sword gains +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 speed. Limit, once per round.

During the settlement phase you may spend d to train a survivor. They gain the Black Guard Style secret fighting art. You lose it and suffer the broken arm severe injury.
sfa.name: Black Guard Style

injuries.name: Intracranial Hemorrhage
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot gain or spend survival

injuries.name: Deaf
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
-1 permanent evasion.

You cannot be encouraged.

injuries.name: Blind
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

First Injury: -1 permanent accuracy.
Second Injury: -4 permanent accuracy and retire at end of showdown or settlement phase.

injuries.name: Shattered Jaw
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot consume.

You cannot Encourage.

injuries.name: Dismembered Arm
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

First Injury: Cannot activate two-handed weapons.
Second Injury: Cannot activate any weapons.

injuries.name: Ruptured Muscle
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot activate Fighting Arts.

injuries.name: Contracture
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent accuracy

injuries.name: Broken Arm
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent accuracy.

-1 permanent strength.

injuries.name: Dislocated Shoulder
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot activate two-handed or paired weapons or use block.

injuries.name: Gaping Chest Wound
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent strength.

injuries.name: Destroyed Back
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent movement.

Cannot activate gear with 2+ strength.

injuries.name: Disemboweled
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.
Skip next hunt.

Movement is 1.

If you are the only survivor alive when showdown ends, you die.

injuries.name: Broken Rib
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent speed.

injuries.name: Intestinal Prolapse
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot equip gear to your waist.

injuries.name: Warped Pelvis
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent luck.

injuries.name: Destroyed Genitals
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token, a random disorder, and +3 insanity.

You are Knocked Down.

You cannot be nominated for Intimacy.

injuries.name: Broken Hip
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent movement.

You cannot Dodge.

injuries.name: Slashed Back
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot Surge.

injuries.name: Bruised Tail-bone
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You are Knocked Down.

You cannot Dash.

injuries.name: Dismembered Leg
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-2 permanent movement.

You cannot Dash.
Second Injury: Retire at end of showdown or settlement phase

injuries.name: Hamstrung
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot use Fighting Arts or Abilities.

injuries.name: Torn Achilles Tendon
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.
Skip next hunt.

You cannot Dash

injuries.name: Broken Leg
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent Movement

When suffered, adjacent survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

injuries.name: Frenzy
injuries.desc:
(can gain multiple times)
Gain +1d5 insanity.
Gain +1 speed, +1 strength tokens.
You cannot spend survival (unless you have Bitter Frenzy). You cannot use fighting arts, weapon specialization or mastery.

(Lasts until end of showdown)

injuries.name: Endless Babble
injuries.desc:
When you depart, departing survivors gain +1 insanity.

You cannot encourage.

injuries.name: Marrow Hunger
injuries.desc: If the Murder or Skull Eater settlement events are drawn, nominate this survivor.

abilities.name: Ageless
abilities.desc:
(Saviors cannot use Ageless)
You may hunt if you are retired.

When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.

abilities.name: Acid Palms
abilities.desc: Add 1d10 strength to wound attempts when attacking with Fist & Tooth.

abilities.name: Analyze
abilities.desc: At the start of the survivors turn, if you are adjacent to the monster, reveal the top b, then place it back on top of the deck.

abilities.name: Bitter Frenzy
abilities.desc: Each Showdown, the first time you suffer the Frenzy brain trauma, gain 1d10 Survival. You may spend survival while Frenzied.

abilities.name: Burnt Nerves
abilities.desc: You are immune to bash.

abilities.name: Caratosis
abilities.desc:
Your attack may gain X automatic hits. X cannot be more than your total
.

When the attack ends, gain +X hunt XP.

When you trigger Age 2, gain the Beast of Caratosis secret fighting art.

abilities.name: Crystal Skin
abilities.desc:
You ignore cursed and cannot wear armor.

When you depart gain 3 to all hit locations.

Suffer -2 to the result of all severe injury rolls.

When you participate In intimacy, newborns gain Crystal Skin in addtion to any other roll results.

abilities.name: Dormenatus
abilities.desc:
When you suffer damage, you may gain X armor points to each hit location. X cannot be more than your total
.

After the damage is resolved, gain +X hunt XP.

abilities.name: Explore
abilities.desc: When you roll on an investigate table, add +2 to your roll result.

abilities.name: Fated Battle
abilities.desc: At the start of a showdown with the picked monster, gain +1 speed token.

abilities.name: Homing Instinct
abilities.desc: Add +5 to your rolls on the Run Away story event.

abilities.name: Iron Will
abilities.desc:
You cannot be knocked down.

Reduce all knockback you suffer to knockback 1.

abilities.name: Legendcaller
abilities.desc:
Once per lifetime, when on a hunt board space, after the Overwhelming Darkness space:

In place of rolling a random hunt event, use 53 as your result.

abilities.name: Leyline Walker
abilities.desc: While there is no armor or accessory gear in your gear grid, gain +3 evasion.

abilities.name: Lucernae
abilities.desc:
Wound attempts may gain X Luck. X cannot be more than your total
.

When the attack ends, gain +X hunt XP.

abilities.name: Mad Grade
abilities.desc:
Once per showdown, as a monster draws an b, name a card.

If the b drawn is the named card, gain +1 evasion token.

abilities.name: Mad Oracle
abilities.desc:
Once per showdown, as a monster draws an b, name a card.

If the b drawn is the named card, gain +1 evasion token.

abilities.name: Matchmaker
abilities.desc: When you are a returning survivor, once per lantern year, you may spend d to roll on the Intimacy event.

abilities.name: Metal Maw
abilities.desc:
Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain Sharp:

Add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt.

abilities.name: Peerless
abilities.desc: When you gain Insanity, you may gain an equal amount of Survival.

abilities.name: Possessed
abilities.desc: You cannot use weapon specialization, weapon mastery, or fighting arts.

abilities.name: Prepared
abilities.desc: When rolling to determine a straggler, add your hunt XP to your roll result.

abilities.name: Sour Death
abilities.desc: When you are knocked down, you may encourage yourself (even if you are Deaf). If you do, gain +1 Strength token.

abilities.name: Stalwart
abilities.desc: Ignore knocked down effects of brain trauma, disorders, and intimidation actions.

abilities.name: Story of the Forsaker
abilities.desc: You cannot be knocked down during a showdown with a Nemesis Monster.

abilities.name: Story of the Goblin
abilities.desc: Once per showdown, you may roll 1d10. On a 3+, gain the priority target token and the monster gains +1 damage token.

abilities.name: Story of the Young Hero
abilities.desc: At the start of each of your acts, you may choose to gain 1 survival and 2 bleeding tokens.

abilities.name: Sweet Battle
abilities.desc: Once per round, you may surge without spending survival, but it must be used to activate a weapon.

abilities.name: Thundercaller
abilities.desc:
Once per lifetime, when on a hunt board space, after the Overwhelming Darkness space:

In place of rolling a random hunt event, use 100 as your result.

abilities.name: Tinker
abilities.desc: When you are a returning survivor, gain +1 d to use this settlement phase.
During the Aftermath, if you gain weapon XP, gain +3 additional weapon XP and 1 iron strange resource as you cough up a hunk of your own solidified blood.
abilities.name: Heart of the Storm

abilities.desc: For each different color affinity on your gear grid, gain 1 armor to all hit locations.
abilities.name: Iridescent Hide

abilities.desc: Once per settlement phase you may spend d d to carve a prosthetic limb for a survivor. If you do, that survivor removes one "dismembered" injury and adds 1 bone resource to the settlement storage.
abilities.name: Limb-maker

abilities.desc:
Gain
permanent affinity.

For each
, once per round, during your turn, before you roll a die, you may choose the result of that die.

In Aftermath, gain +3 additional Hunt XP.

You cannot put "other" gear in your grid.

Gain a permanent +1 speed with each Age milestone.

When you retire, you cease to exist.
abilities.name: Nebulae

abilities.desc: At the start of the showdown you may look through the b deck, then shuffle it and return it.
abilities.name: Oracle's Eye

abilities.desc:
When you gain this ability, name a survivor. The named survivor is your partner.

When you depart, if your partner also departs, gain +2 survival.

During the showdown phase, if you are adjacent to your partner, gain +1 strength.

You may only participate in g Intimacy if your partner is also nominated for it.

When your partner dies, gain a random disorder and remove this ability.
abilities.name: Partner

abilities.desc: Before drawing hit locations, you may name a hit location. If you draw any hit locations with that name during your attack, gain +3 insanity and +10 strength when attempting to wound that location.
abilities.name: Presage

abilities.desc: When you would suffer a "Dismembered" severe injury, ignore it and gain +1 bleeding token instead
abilities.name: Pristine

abilities.desc:
Once per showdown, you may consume a disorder from an adjacen survivor.

If you do, that survivor removes that disorder and gains +1 bleeding token. You also gain a permanent +1 strength.

During the Aftermath, if you did not consume a disorder in this way, you die.
abilities.name: Psychovore

abilities.desc: If you are standing at the start of your turn, reveal the top 2 b, then return them in any order to the top of the monster's b deck.
abilities.name: Rooted to All

abilities.desc: You may spend a to freely exchange tokens with adjacent survivors who also have Super Hair.
abilities.name: Super Hair

abilities.desc:
You cannot carry two-handed gear.

Any time you roll to attack, on a perfect hit, gain +5 insanity and +1 luck on that attack.

Any time you roll to attack, on a natural 1, suffer 5 brain damage and -1 luck on that attack.
abilities.name: Twelve Fingers

abilities.desc: You gain +1 evasion for each bleeding token you have.
abilities.name: Way of the Rust
